data.name: Suspicious eMail Inline
data.demo_message: 7) FortiSOAR wide Search the originally dropped file

body.html:
MIS Team, Please investigate the forwarded email below, it looks suspicious. Thank you
Masha
Marketing Dept
+9754235452
From: CTO Office
Date: {{TR_PAST}}
To: Masha
CC: "dricardo@fortielab.com"
Subject:immediate action required
A Critical vulnerability has been found in our internal ERP client application
, a patch has been made available in our internal website Windows Patch
.It is mandatory for all employes to download it and install it immediately.
Office of the CTO

headers.subject: Fw: immediate action required
headers.received: from Exch19.fortielab.com ([::1]) by Exch19.fortielab.com ([::1]) with mapi id 15.02.0529.005; {{TR_PAST}}
